bibl.title: An Egyptian Narrative from Karanis (P. Mich. inv. 5641a)
bibl.note: Karanis (Building 132), Second century AD. On the recto, Greek text of documentary nature. - See pp. 332-333: Archaeological Context. Points to other literary texts found in Building 132, in part. P. Mich. Inv. 5640 ined. (Greek mythological fragment about Phaethon) and 5771 ined. (fragments of Aesop's fables).
